question:
Recently, the world's first diamond futures exchange has been started in India. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. It has been started by the National Multi-Commodity Exchange (NMCE)
  2. It is regulated by the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI)
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is incorrect</u> because the worldâ€™s first diamond exchange has been started by the Indian Commodity Exchange (ICEX), anchored by the Anil Ambani Group. <u>Second statement is correct</u>. The exchange is regulated by the Securities Board of India. Currently, India has six commodity trading exchanges namely Multi Commodity Exchange (MCX); National Commodity and Derivative Exchange (NCDEX); National Multi-Commodity Exchange (NMCE); Indian Commodity Exchange (ICEX); Ahmedabad Commodity Exchange (ACE) and Universal Commodity Exchange (UCX).
